New Records: Kylian Mbappé scored his first ever goal at a European Championship
Robert Lewandowski scored at the fourth consecutive edition of the UEFA European Championship
Key Match Events: Kylian Mbappé scored a penalty in the second half
Robert Lewandowski scored a penalty for Poland's equalizer
Pre-Game Insights: Kylian Mbappé was expected to take center stage due to his return from injury
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps chose to make a triple substitution shortly after going ahead, which affected France's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: France failed to win their final group stage match at a major tournament for a ninth consecutive tournament
Others: France dominated the ball and grew into the game as the first half went on
Poland showed plenty of attacking intent and retained a threat on the break
